name: Parejas
description:
In Parejas you can play with the elements of the city of Madrid and join them together.

This game is based on the spanish eponymous poem by Gloria Fuertes "PAREJAS".

The couples that must be formed are those that propose their verses. We wanted to capture that naïve aesthetic and playground that Parejas has in a Madrid neighborhood.

Check out the Parejas Wiki here: https://parejas.fandom.com/wiki/Parejas_Wiki#
